TopicTitle: You never guess who I met

Articles.Content:
So I am in Tennessee working on a project called DebriSat, which exists to characterize the debris that forms from an on orbit collision. To do so, we employed a giant gun that blasted an Aluminum slug into the satellite at a brisk 7 kilometers per second. But that's not the big deal...

Turns out our boss is friends with one Donald J. Kessler, and he showed up to observe the test. Guess who got to meet Don "Kessler Syndrome" Kessler. Yeah. This guy!

Anyway, I thought you guys might appreciate this. Yeah, I'm bragging a little bit. Sorry.
Did you tell him you've scattered many a booster in LKO in his honor?
Haha! Would have loved to. Never got to talk to him much. Trying to get an interview for my research but that doesn't look like it's going to materialize. Sad!

How did you feel?Was it like blowing up into a billion rainbows of joy?

*Insert kessler pun here*
"After some simulations in KSP we conclude that the best way to get rid of debris is to call danny 2462. He will break the game leading to a new save without debris at all"

we employed a giant gun that blasted an aluminum slug into the satellite at a brisk 7 kilometers per second

science!!!!!

science!!!!!

This forum needs a like button. Lol!

This forum needs a like button. Lol!

It has one. The reputation button. The little police/sheriff/whatever sign, but theres no Rep in off-topic.
